Reviews.Title: CANNOT KEEP BATTERIES CHARGED
Reviews.Author: A. Epperson
Reviews.Content: These cameras are a complete rip off.  They do NOT charge rechargable batteries well enough to keep them working.  Must be opened and battery recharged in a charger every few weeks.  Buy something else.

Reviews.Title: Fooled from afar, maybe...
Reviews.Author: W. Chiu
Reviews.Content: Positives:- Solar panel works well.- Red light blinks at short intervals.- Looks like a real camera at distances of 10 feet or greater.Negatives:- The ring of "infrared" lights that come on after dark is a little too bright to be real IR.- The screw attaching the "antenna" would be a dead giveaway.- Cannot be mounted so the camera is pointed parallel with the mounting surface.It may be convincing enough to ward off some pesky kids but will not fool the trained eye.

ProductInfo.Features:
Blinking Led Every 5 Sec
Simulated Night Vision Leds
Charges In Partial Sunlight
Authentic Styling
Low Maintenance
ProductInfo.Name: Sol-Mate P3 P8320 Night Vision Dummy Camera (Black)
